title: Dark Mode Support
description: Add a dark theme option to reduce eye strain during extended work sessions. This would include a toggle in user settings and automatic detection of system preferences. The dark mode should maintain accessibility standards and provide consistent branding across all interface elements.

title: Real-time Collaboration
description: Enable multiple users to work on the same project simultaneously with live cursors, instant updates, and conflict resolution. This feature would include presence indicators, collaborative editing, and comment threading for seamless teamwork.

title: Advanced Search Filters
description: Implement comprehensive search functionality with filters for date ranges, project types, team members, and custom tags. Include saved search queries and smart suggestions based on user behavior.

title: Mobile App Performance Optimization
description: Improve mobile app loading times and responsiveness. Focus on reducing initial bundle size, implementing lazy loading, and optimizing database queries for better performance on mobile devices.

title: Slack Integration
description: Create seamless integration with Slack workspaces to receive project notifications, share updates, and trigger workflows directly from Slack channels. Include custom slash commands and bot interactions.

title: Custom Dashboard Widgets
description: Allow users to create personalized dashboard layouts with draggable widgets showing project progress, team metrics, upcoming deadlines, and custom KPIs. Include widget sharing between team members.

title: Time Tracking Enhancement
description: Upgrade the time tracking system with automatic detection of idle time, project time allocation, and detailed reporting. Include integration with popular time tracking tools and expense management.

title: API Documentation Improvements
description: Enhance API documentation with interactive examples, better code samples in multiple programming languages, and improved search functionality. Include postman collections and SDK examples.

title: Automated Backup System
description: Implement automatic daily backups of all project data with easy restoration options. Include incremental backups, version history, and data export functionality for compliance requirements.

title: Two-Factor Authentication
description: Add two-factor authentication support with multiple options including SMS, authenticator apps, and hardware tokens. Include backup codes and account recovery procedures for enhanced security.

title: Email Template Customization
description: Allow organizations to customize email notification templates with their branding, custom fields, and personalized messaging. Include A/B testing capabilities for email engagement optimization.

title: Workflow Automation Builder
description: Create a visual workflow builder that allows users to automate repetitive tasks, set up conditional triggers, and integrate with external services. Include pre-built templates and custom scripting options.
